reference_summary:
TAKIYA 72pcs Mixed Assorted Style Full Cover Acrylic False Artificial Nail Tips (3 Boxes，Not Includes Glue)
{'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.06 x 6.65 x 1.06 inches; 2.54 Ounces'}
These are very thin and cheap. Even the designs rub off within a day or two. When I wore the first pair pair I thought it might just be a fluke that they kept breaking off and the design came off. So, I tried a second set. The same thing happened. Just tossed the 3rd set.
Don't waste you money!
Kiss Gel Fantasy Ready-to-Wear Gel 24 Nails KGN53 Olivia (2 Pack)
KISS
{'Size': '2 Pack', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'KISS', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 4.53 x 1.89 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Ivy Enterprises, Inc.'}
Great nails. The best brand I have found. I wear them all of the time. If taken care of they will last about a week. I have found that if you put a top coat or clear polish on top the color doesn't wear off the tips as much adding to the lasting color. I used to do my own nails but got tired of having to wait for the polish to dry especially when in a hurry. These you can put a drop or so of glue and they stay on without damaging your nails. I wear gloves when I do the dishes and clean so they last long. I get compliments all of the time.
Great nails!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to favor artificial nails, particularly acrylic and gel options that provide full coverage with aesthetic appeal. Recent purchases indicate a strong appreciation for creative designs and unique patterns.

- **Quality Concern**: The user maintains a commitment to high-quality products, and their recent positive experience further reinforces their expectation for longevity and craftsmanship. They have found satisfaction in brands known for their durability.

- **Style Dislike**: The user remains averse to products that wear quickly or lack design integrity, continuing to prioritize styles that effectively balance aesthetics with performance.

- **Frustration with Performance**: Although previous frustrations with low-quality products were noted, recent positive interactions highlight the user's nuanced understanding of various brands and their offerings, contributing to a more informed purchasing approach.

- **Rating Behavior**: The user has shown an inclination to rate quality products favorably, with the latest purchase reflecting a satisfied experience that substantiates their high standards regarding durability and design.

- **Buying Caution**: While the user displays cautious tendencies in purchasing, their recent transactions reveal an increased confidence in selecting specific brands that have demonstrated reliable performance, showcasing an adaptive approach informed by positive past experiences.

Overall, the user's behavior emphasizes the pursuit of quality and durability in beauty products, combined with an appreciation for innovative designs in their recent selections.
